Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Craig Ledesma
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my daughter, she has taken some really good pictures and the camera has lived up to what they say about it. Good camera and great service as always from Amazon. No issues

Reviews.Title: I bought it at another store
Reviews.Author: Paul Sprauer
Reviews.Content: it was 10 dollars more and the SD card was little more also but the Camera is really great, video if you shoot video clips is real good, pictures are really graet also it has a lot of things on it. It also has software inside of of the camera that you can install on your computer I got the red one. But I would recommend buying it off of Amazon sense you will save some money on it but I didn't want to wait on shipping so I spent a little more. I got the SD 16 Gig card that you can get cheaper on Amazon than where I got my from.

Reviews.Title: fantastic !
Reviews.Author: paul baker
Reviews.Content: very easy to use ! Have a Nikon cool pix . manual is like a book ! Never could get it ! this camera . turn it on and it tells you ! In one day ! I could do 10 times ! What I was never able to do with my Nikon !

Reviews.Title: WB100
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: GREAT camera for the price but when it's recording video the sound cuts out randomly every 6 or 7 seconds.  Hopefully Samsung cares enough about their customer to address this.  If not, just use it for taking pics

Reviews.Title: Not too small...not too big!
Reviews.Author: Charles J Santoni
Reviews.Content: I've had more expensive cameras in the past, but they got so small, they were getting difficult to operate. This is just right for Papa Bear and take a pretty good shot as well!

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Denise Heinrichs
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of options and not all obvious so I had to download the full manual.  For indoor pictures with only lamps, no natural light, do not use Smart mode, you need to adjust the white light

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB 100
Reviews.Author: Bill Mueller
Reviews.Content: I worked well for why I bought it. The only thing I don't like is the absence of a full manual setting for control.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Heather Weber
Reviews.Content: Still getting used to the camera but it takes great pictures and I am having fun experimenting with it.  It is larger than what I'm used to, but the picture is not deceiving on the size.  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good camera- not a touch screen
Reviews.Author: Lorraine M
Reviews.Content: In the description it says that this camera has a touch screen on the back but it is not at all touch screen. Overall happy with the camera - takes good pictures. Batteries last for a long time before having to replace them

Reviews.Title: bargus
Reviews.Author: Bargus
Reviews.Content: we bought this to take on our upcoming trip to Europe but have been using it at home in the meantime.  It is very simple to operate and the picture quality is great!!  It definitely is of the high quality we have found in Samsung products at a good price!!

Reviews.Title: Good resolution
Reviews.Author: Linda & Bob
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed the camera did not have a trough the lenes view finder. For outdoor use using the display screen to find and frame a shot was difficult.

Reviews.Title: Okay.
Reviews.Author: Paige
Reviews.Content: good camera. i like this you just have to be carefull. it take awhile to get a good shot. the shutter speed is very slow. but an okay camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jackson
Reviews.Content: The camera is able to capture amazing picture with a great optical zoom of 26x. It also offered a wide variety of functions that can add affects to your photo ranging from cartoon filter to panorama shoot. Even though the lens is not replaceable like DSLR, this is the best things that you can get for the price.

Reviews.Title: nice pics
Reviews.Author: nanya
Reviews.Content: a good camera but a little big and heavy to carry all the time.Even with the camera bag ,it is easier to take pics with the phone but the camera pics are so much better

Reviews.Title: good and useful camera
Reviews.Author: G. Yau "TY"
Reviews.Content: nice camera but look like repacked the use one. I test it and over all still acceptable be used and still good result

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon lover
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price! Just what I wanted. Glad I took a chance! Personal reviews helped alot with my decision thanks

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: digna sanchez jimenez
Reviews.Content: This article is excellent, and very low cost, very much like a camera Cadre, take perfect images with good resoluccion

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: This camera was excellent!! It was a gift for my Daughter. She and I were very impressed with it. Thanx

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: tuck34
Reviews.Content: Feels good takes great pics video quality is very good only downside is the batteries dont last that long if taking alot of video but overall great camera

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: david denman
Reviews.Content: I am new at digital cameras.  Saw no use to give up my old ones, while everyone else got new ones.  So havehad no  reason to think digital until my wife`s old style Canon went bad, and got tired of not being able toconnect to my computer to download, etc.  So far, I am amazed at all the things I can do, and I haven`t scratched thesurface yet.....the only thing is it seems a little CHEAP that Samsung cannot put a good instruction manual in thebox with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Excelent camera
Reviews.Author: Juan Moncada
Reviews.Content: It works perfect for me, im sports editor and all the featires of this camera makes my work easier, design its perfect and easy to handle

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: James L. Fowler "du doch nicht!"
Reviews.Content: When shopping for the "right" camera, it is impossible to pick your next "perfect" instrument by reading reviews/opinions/heresay, etc., one must simply use the camera, in actual situations to really see how all turns out.  I am very pleased with my Samsung WB100, but must confess that there is sooooo much to learn about it's quirks/tweaks that a full review is, thusfar, not my intention here.  The 26x is stunning, but remember to use OIS, Optical Image Stabilizer.  Another piece of information to remember (!) in the video mode:  while filming with sound recording, do NOT zoom in on a subject because the audio does NOT record.  Why is this important to me?  This camera was purchased to use for our daughters' PhD Psychology hooding ceremony, AND, due to this operator's error, I zoomed as she was walking up the steps to the stage, and as they were introducing Dr. - - -, having attained this over a 6 year study period, the zoom did not record her name.  Devistated? YES....fault of the Samsung? Not at all.  Bottom line; read and understand all the Owners Manual (had to download a .pdf file for this, it is not included) tips and "how to's".  Great camera? Yes... Important for said user to read with understanding?  YES.  Oh, yes, one last thing:  the batteries (4 AA's), even though they are Duracell Ultra Power MX 1500's do NOT last long at all.  Having shot only 73 pictures and roughly 10 minutes of video, the batteries needed changing....carry spare ones in you bag!Enjoy, this camera is worth every penny paid.

Reviews.Title: Samsung makes a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Daniel E. Sanford "Dan Sanford"
Reviews.Content: Automatic features (Samsung's 'Smart' function) or manual, video (mp4) or panoramic exposures; all are features I got with this camera and for only $149! I almost didn't buy this; I had to return a defective Nikon S3500 and for another $20 I exchanged it for this Samsung.Samsung is not a brand name high on the list of optical tools (as far as I know!) . . . yet. If they can continue to outmatch part for part and feature for feature, the best known brands in cameras best not rest on their laurels and the weight of their name only.I bought this to use as a camera, not a camcorder. Having said this, when I used the movie function, I discovered that the audio cuts out if the zoom (in or out) is active while 'filming' (funny word for a digital medium).For photographic purposes, I have all I wanted - and more - with Samsung's WB100, and for an excellent price. If I have need for digital video, I will certainly look for Samsung alternatives before shopping among the bigger name brands.

Reviews.Title: Great decision!!
Reviews.Author: Irene Arevalo
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good pictures, they have amazing effects and trust me, I'm really happy with my purchase. I recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: Works great . Outside in the bright sunlight couldn't see anything but myself in the view screen. Like looking in a mirror. Devised a shade and fixed the problem.Love that it uses AAA batteries. You can get them everywhere. Fantastic pictures with the panorama mode.Haven't had to use the flash indoors and with regular lighting  got really good pictures.Can't beat this camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Glad we purchased.
Reviews.Author: Melissa Joyce
Reviews.Content: We are really enjoying taking pictures with this camera and it takes really great pictures! Samsung's product specialists are also great at helping you when you have questions.

Reviews.Title: Dopeness in a camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: sweetthunder
Reviews.Content: Got the camera today as a birthday gift and I am truly mesmerized at the quality of the camera and the awesome pictures it takes .Also the price I paid was a complete steal considering how great of a camera it is

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable camera experience!
Reviews.Author: OmLz "Omar"
Reviews.Content: I got this smart camera less than a week ago; as a previous and satisfied owner of Samsung cameras (HMX-R10 and SL605) I decided to continue using this brand of products, so, I made my very own research based on the variety of cameras from other manufacturers with similar features and technical specifications.It took me about three days to decide that this one will be the perfect one.The camera looks nice -My friends mentioned it looks expensive and professional, they were surprised when I told them how much I paid for it-I started using the camera almost immediately since the box includes 4 AA batteries and the camera has internal memory, first thing first: Set-up the camera, then, start taking photos.I had to download the full user's manual directly from Samsung's web page and while reading the manual I found out that this product does a lot -allow me to rephrase that- A LOT of things with the functionalities included.This is my best purchase from 2013 so far!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Rick "SargD"
Reviews.Content: Lot's of nice features and good pictures. The video is lacking and mine had a defect on the lens. I returned it and got the Nikon coolpix S9500. Cost's a little more but well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Okay quality
Reviews.Author: cbtaylo2
Reviews.Content: I very much enjoyed taking pictures with this camera.  But I decided to return it because there were some aspects that I didn't like.  For example, a lot of the pics I had a blurry look to them. Also, the focus wasn't that great; the camera would seem to have trouble focusing well.  It's a good camera, just not what I'm looking for.

Reviews.Title: Hit and Miss with Auto Focus
Reviews.Author: Jamin
Reviews.Content: Some pictures are good but some are not focused sharp. I checked some other reviews and someone suggested, press the button half way first. No matter what I tried, its still a Hit or Miss.I have DSLR camera also and never experienced the Auto Focus issues.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: Donna Teafatiller
Reviews.Content: I am not impressed with the zoom, indoor shots or action shots.  Portraits and close-ups are fine, but that is all.  I regret purchasing the camera and would not recommend it.I was MOST unhappy with the packaging of the item. The wrapping was only partially inflated - a very small portion - and it was not packed properly.  The box was ripped, bent and crushed.  When I questioned the carrier (& showed her photos of the packaging), I was told the box needed to be firmly packed to avoid the crushing that occurred.  I also emailed the company very early the morning after I placed the order requesting a change in shipping, but did not receive a response until the next day, at which time I was told it was too late to make a change.  Again, NOT IMPRESSED.I will think twice before ordering from Amazon again, if this is the service I receive.

Reviews.Title: Bad camera or are they all like that?
Reviews.Author: Ruth H
Reviews.Content: The Samsung WB100 that I received did not work well at all. I got it for a special family occasion and ended up with no pictures. The first day I got it, it seemed o.k.  It was nothing great but about half the pictures came out good. The others where off color or not focused. I was only using the smart setting so I thought maybe it was that. Forget the zoom- just blur. The video had to be right on top of the person or was blur and had a loud noise the whole time during playback to the point that I could not hear the person .  Three days later at the family event, I could not even get the camera to focus. It was all blur. I was so disappointed with this camera so back it went.  I did not want to get a replacement camera  to find out if mine was just a bad camera or all were like this. I just wanted to be done with this camera. I do have to give the return process 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: good product, recommended
Reviews.Author: Leonardo
Reviews.Content: Because I'm satisfied with the product received.Would recommend to my acquaintances.I do not recommend to anyone who buys
